Subject: More dodging and shooting
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He jumped out of the way.
"We could do this all day. How about trying."
He shot two optics, four plasma charges, and two rockets, at Unitron.
The were in a formation so if he stood still his whole body would be
hit, and if he moved he would still be injured.
